creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
The BaseHref configuration value for FCKeditor is set in the fckloader.js file
which is called from fckeditor.jx. This sets the BaseHref value to the
application server's host and port via HTTP. This screws things up when proxying
the authoring side, as the images being inserted are being pulled directly from
the app server. If the authoring environment is proxied through a secure
connection, this usually results in mixed content error messages.

Created attachment 19937
Removes BaseHref and host information

Tested in HTTPS proxied environment and through connecting directly to app
server.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
